title: EventTide Wellness - Acupuncture, Massage, Classical Chinese Medicine
description: EvenTide Wellness, based in Washington DC, provides wellness services including Massage Therapy, Acupuncture, Biodynamic Craniosacral Therapy and more.
cleaned_text: Featured Services We believe that every person has the innate capacity to heal from physical, mental, spiritual and emotional illness or dysfunction. Sacred Medicine Ceremony As a curandera initiate in the Mahua-Lopez line of the Amazonian Shibibo-Konibo tribe, Liana hosts private and small group sacred medicine ceremonies and retreats. Acupuncture Similar to how rivers flow through the terrain of the landscape, subtle energy called 'Qi' (pronounced "chi") flows through our bodies. Chinese Herbal Medicine and Dietary Therapy Chinese Herbal Medicine is a sophisticated and effective form of therapy that has been used for thousands of years. Chinese herbal formulas work not simply through chemical interactions, but also through subtle resonance with the person taking them. © 2023 EvenTide Wellnes | acupuncture, chinese herbal medicine & more
